doc:
Max Régnier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_R%C3%A9gnier 0 Max Régnier (4 December 1907 - 5 August 1993) was a French dramatist, play writer, theater director and actor. He was managing director of the théâtre de la Porte-Saint-Martin from 1949 up to 1969. Max_Régnier ( 4_December_1907 - 5_August_1993 ) was a_French_dramatist , play writer , theater_director_and_actor . He was_managing director of the_théâtre_de_la_Porte-Saint-Martin from 1949_up to 1969 .
